solution_line_template: If Homer scored {first_try_score} points on the first try, he scored {first_try_score}-{fewer_second_try} = <<{first_try_score}-{fewer_second_try}={second_try_score}>>{second_try_score} points on the second try.

The total number of points that Homer scored in the game after two tries are {first_try_score}+{second_try_score} = <<{first_try_score}+{second_try_score}={total_score_two_tries}>>{total_score_two_tries}

On the third try of the Candy crush game, Homer scored twice the number of points she scored on the second try, a total of {multiplier_third_try}*{second_try_score} = <<{third_try_score}={third_try_score}>>{third_try_score} points.
In all the tries of the game, Homer scored {third_try_score}+{total_score_two_tries} = <<{third_try_score}+{total_score_two_tries}={total_score_all_tries}>>{total_score_all_tries} points.
